translations: n.小羊驼；骆马；骆马毛服装

sentences.sentence: People gather around the disfigured bodies of vicunas that were allegedly killed by poachers.
sentences.translation: 人们聚集在被偷猎者非法猎杀的骆马尸体周围。

sentences.sentence: It can infect all cloven-hoofed animals--cattle goats sheep pigs water buffalo deer bison antelope reindeer llamas chamois alpacas vicunas giraffes impala elk and camels.
sentences.translation: 它可以感染所有的有蹄类动物一牛、山羊、绵羊、猪、水牛、鹿、野牛、羚羊、驯鹿、驼羊、跳羚、羊驼、驼马、长颈鹿、黑斑羚、麋鹿和骆驼。
